name: Purgatory Fell
description: Purgatory Fell is a psychological thriller set in 1955. Explore the declining mind of a man who cannot sleep. A progression of nightmares reveals hints about who you were, and what you are becoming.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 equivalent or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Compatible HDMI 1.3 video output
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
